Horiseon

Built With: HTML, CSS

Horiseon is a website that helps business owners find feasible clients.It controls the online opinion that their clients will have access to. It determines the platforms that are most compatible with their brand.

View Project on GitHub

Post Pandemic Dating

Built With: JavaScript, HTML, CSS, jQuery, Bootstrap

Post Pandemic Dating is an application for people who are planning romantic dates in the United States of America post quarantine. The application offers the user a quick search for information on the weather, holidays, events, and places to eat in the city. On top of that we offer the user a random recommended cocktail to enjoy on said date.

View Project on GitHub
